title: CCRAS Recruitment 2017 – MTS, Sr Consultant & Other Posts

organizations.name: validation of prakriti assessment questionnaire/ scale development
central ayurveda research institute for cancer
central council for research in ayurvedic sciences

text: Click here for SRF Post Details NIIMH Jobs 2017 – Walk in for MTS, Sr Consultant & Other Posts: National Institute of Indian Medical Heritage (NIIMH), Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences, Ministry of AYUSH , Govt of India, Hyderabad has invited applications for the recruitment of Senior Consultant (Ayurveda), Senior Research Fellow (Ayurveda), Pharmacist, Data Entry Operator, Multi Tasking Staff (MTS) vacancies on contractual basis for the “Tribal Health Care Research Project” under Tribal Sub Plan. Eligible candidates may walk in written test/ interview on 15-02-2017 at 11:00 am. Other detalis like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… NIIMH Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 06 Name of the Posts: 1. Senior Consultant (Ayurveda): 01 Post 2. Senior Research Fellow (Ayurveda): 01 Post 3. Pharmacist: 01 Post 4. Data Entry Operator: 01 Post 5. Multi Tasking Staff: 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be up to 65 years for Post 1, 35 years for Post 2, 27 years for Post 3, 4, 5 as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation will be admissible for SC/ ST/ OBC/ PH as per Central Govt, rules in force. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess MD/ MS (Ayurveda) from any Recognized university for Post 1, B.A.M.S. Degree for Post 2, Diploma in Pharmacy/D.Pharma (Ayurveda) for Post 3, Bachelor Degree in Any Discipline, Diploma in Computer Education for Post 4, Matriculation (10th Pass) for Post 5 with relevant experience. Selection Process: Selection will be based on written test, interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may appear for written test/ interview along with Bio-data along, original certificates, experience certificate etc, a set o f photocopies and two recent passport size photographs on 15-02-2017 at 11:00 am. Important Dates: Date & Time of Written Test, Interview: 15-02-2017 at 11:00 am. Reporting Time: 10:00 am. Click here for Recruitment Advt RRCA Jobs 2017 – Data Entry Operator Posts: Ministry of AYUSH, Govt of India, Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS), Regional Research Centre Of Ayurveda (RRCA) Port Blair has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Data Entry Operator vacancies for the project entitled of “Tribal Health Care Research Project (covering A&N State)” purely on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before 16-02-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… RRCA Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 02 Name of the Post: Data Entry Operator Age Limit: Candidates age should be 27 years as on 01-02-2017. Age relaxation is admissible for SC/ ST/ OBC as per Govt. Rules. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Bachelor Degree from a recognized University, Diploma in Computer/ Certificate in Computer Application, Typing speed of 30 w.p.m. in English. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on applicants performance in Written Test, Skill Test and Interview. How to Apply : Eligible candidates can send their bio-data in the prescribed proforma along with a set of photocopies of educational/ technical qualification, experience certificate and two recent passport size photographs to Office of the Research Officer In-charge, Regional Research Centre of Ayurveda, Qtr No. JGE/28 Type-II, Near AYUSH Hospital, Junglighat, Port Blair- 744103 on or before 16-02-2017. Last Date for receipt of Application: 16-02-2017. For more details like vacancy details, general conditions & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt Raja Ramdeo Anandilal Podar Jobs 2017 – SRF Posts: Raja Ramdeo Anandilal Podar, Central Ayurveda Research Institute for Cancer, Mumbai has invited applications for the recruitment of Senior Research Fellow (SRF)- (Ay.) vacancies on contractual basis for the project “Development and Validation of Prakriti Assessment Questionnaire/ Scale Development of a standardized questionnaire for assessment of Prakriti and its relevance with parameters of health and disease)”. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 20-02-2017 at 09:30 am. Other detalis like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Raja Ramdeo Anandilal Podar Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: Senior Research Fellow (Ay.) Age Limit: Candidates age should be 35 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation will be admissible for SC/ ST/ OBC as per Central GOI rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess BAMS with experience having worked for any research project funded by the Ministry of AYUSH, ICMR, CSIR, DST or equivalent organization. Selection Process: Selection will be based on written test/ interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may submit their applications along with two passport size photographs and self attested photocopies of the certificates to (Scientist-Ill) In-charge, Raja Ramdeo Anandilal Podar, Central Ayurveda Research Institute for Cancer, Podar Medical Campus, Dr. Annie Besant Road, Worli, Mumbai 400018 on or before 20-02-2017 at 09:30 am. Important Dates: Last Date for Receipt of Applications: 20-02-2017 at 09:30 am. Date & Time of Written Test, Interview: 20-02-2017 at 09:30 am. For more details like experience, remuneration & other information click on the link given below… Raja Ramdeo Anandilal Podar
